snippet: The kingdom, where terrorist attacks have been relatively rare, shut its last remaining entry points and declared the frontier a military zone.
abstract: Jordan closes last remaining entry points for Syrian refugees after car bomb explodes at border, killing six security personnel and wounding 14 others; government officials declare northern and northeastern borders of country a military zone, and announce expansion of refugee camps has been halted.
lead_paragraph: The kingdom, where terrorist attacks have been relatively rare, shut its last remaining entry points and declared the frontier a military zone.

headline.main: Jordan Closes Border to Syrian Refugees After Suicide Car Bomb Kills 6
headline.print_headline: Jordan Seals Its Border After Car Bomb Kills 6
